 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָוָה‎</span>] **verb** ==be saturated, drink one's fill== (Late Hebrew in derived species; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְוִי‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָוְָֽתָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדָּמָם‎</span> [[Jer.46.10|Jer 46:10]], figurative of sword (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׂבְעָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָֽכְלָה‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְוְיֻן מִדֶּשֶׁן בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.36.9|Ps 36:9]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75u»§ 75u</sup>) figurative of men (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁקֵם‎</span>); 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְוֶה דֹדִים‎</span> [[Prov.7.18|Prov 7:18]] ***we will take our fill of love*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִתְעַלְּסָה‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִוְּתָה‎</span> [[Isa.34.5|Isa 34:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> consecutive v[[Isa.34.7|Isa 34:7]] 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרִוֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Jer.31.14|Jer 31:14]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרַיָּ֫וֶךְ‎</span> [[Isa.16.9|Isa 16:9]] (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרַוַּ֫יִךְ‎</span> Margolis<sup>Amos. J. Semitic Lang., Oct. 1902, 48,</sup> see also [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 589 f.</sup>; &gt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרַוָּ֫יֶךְ‎</span> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 634 e</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75dd»§ 75dd</sup>); 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַוֻּךָ‎</span> [[Prov.5.19|Prov 5:19]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַוֵּה‎</span> [[Ps.65.11|Ps 65:11]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113z»§ 113z</sup>); — 

**1.** intensive ***be intoxicated, drunk*** [[Isa.34.5|Isa 34:5]], figurative of sword; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדָּם‎</span> v[[Isa.34.7|Isa 34:7]], of land (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְדֻשָּׁ֑ן‎</span>). 

**2.** causative, ***drench, water abundantly***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלָמֶיהָ‎</span> (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); [[Isa.16.9|Isa 16:9]] with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּמְעָתִי‎</span> material; ***saturate*** (figurative), ***sate***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶפֶשׁ הַכֹּהֲנִים דָּ֑שֶׁן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ור‎</span> [[Jer.31.14|Jer 31:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂבע‎</span>); sexually, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּדָּיהָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַוֻּךָ‎</span> [[Prov.5.19|Prov 5:19]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְוָה‎</span> [[Isa.55.10|Isa 55:10]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְוַנִי‎</span> [[Lam.3.15|Lam 3:15]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְוִיתָ֑נִי‎</span> [[Isa.43.24|Isa 43:24]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְוֵיתִי‎</span> [[Jer.31.25|Jer 31:25]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְוֶה‎</span> [[Prov.11.25|Prov 11:25]] — ***saturate, water***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארץ‎</span> [[Isa.55.10|Isa 55:10]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁלֶג‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּשֶׁם‎</span>); ***cause to drink*** (figurative), with accusative of person etrei (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲנָה‎</span>) [[Lam.3.15|Lam 3:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂבִּיעַנִי‎</span>); with accusative of person only (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span>) [[Jer.31.25|Jer 31:25]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּאתִי‎</span>), absolute [[Prov.11.25|Prov 11:25]] of Israel satisfying <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵלֶב זְבָחִים‎</span> [[Isa.43.24|Isa 43:24]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺרֶא‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרְוֶה‎</span> ?) [[Prov.11.25|Prov 11:25]] see Toy and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירא‎</span> p. 432.
